          <h2>
           Resources by Course
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_2" id="content10505645">
          <div id="boxatt10505645" class="boxatt">
           <div class="linklist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12765746">
              <a id="link_12765746" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/slaverynewworld" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12765746,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Africana Studies', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765746});">
               Comparative Slavery in the New World
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12765751">
              <a id="link_12765751" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/atlanticworld" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12765751,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Africana Studies', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765751});">
               Life and Death in the Atlantic World
              </a>
             </li>
             <li id="link12765753">
              <a id="link_12765753" href="http://libraryguides.muhlenberg.edu/racelatam" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12765753,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Africana Studies', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765753});">
               Race &amp; Ethnicity in Latin America
              </a>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>

        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10505522">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10505522">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citation Tools
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10505522">
          <div id="boxatt10505522" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23457438">
              <a id="link_23457438" href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23457438,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Africana Studies', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12811322}); ">
               Citation Guides (Muhlenberg College)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Examples of citation formatting in APA, Chicago, and MLA styles.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12765633">
              <a id="link_12765633" href="https://www.zotero.org/support/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12765633,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Africana Studies', 'page_name' : 'Citation Guides'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12765633}); ">
               Zotero
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Zotero is a free, easy-to-use Firefox extension to help you collect, manage, and cite your research sources.  This handout will help you get started.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
